sentence: The little girl covered her ______ when the music was too loud.
sentence_translation: 音乐太大声时，小女孩捂住了耳朵。

sentence: He hurt his ______ while playing basketball yesterday.
sentence_translation: 他昨天打篮球时伤到了腿。

sentence: The elephant used its ______ to pick up the banana.
sentence_translation: 大象用象鼻捡起了香蕉。

sentence: Poachers often hunt elephants for their ______.
sentence_translation: 偷猎者经常为了象牙而猎杀大象。

sentence: She has a beautiful pair of blue ______.
sentence_translation: 她有一双漂亮的蓝眼睛。

sentence: He dropped his ______ in surprise when he heard the news.
sentence_translation: 听到这个消息，他惊讶得张大了下巴。

sentence: The ______ of animals helps us understand their characteristics better.
sentence_translation: 动物的分类帮助我们更好地了解它们的特征。

sentence: Protecting the ______ of pandas is crucial for their survival.
sentence_translation: 保护熊猫的栖息地对它们的生存至关重要。

sentence: A healthy ______ should include more vegetables and less meat.
sentence_translation: 健康的饮食应该包含更多蔬菜和更少肉类。

sentence: One important ______ of this plant is its ability to survive in dry conditions.
sentence_translation: 这种植物的一个重要特征是能在干旱环境中生存。

sentence: Pollution poses a serious ______ to marine life.
sentence_translation: 污染对海洋生物构成严重威胁。

sentence: Solar energy is a common ______ ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 太阳能是一种常见的可再生能源。

sentence: Many houses now use ______ ______ to generate electricity.
sentence_translation: 现在许多房屋使用太阳能发电。

sentence: Coal is a typical ______ ______ ______ that will eventually run out.
sentence_translation: 煤炭是一种典型的不可再生能源，最终会耗尽。

sentence: ______ ______ is becoming more popular in coastal areas.
sentence_translation: 风能在沿海地区越来越受欢迎。

sentence: Burning ______ ______ releases a lot of carbon dioxide.
sentence_translation: 燃烧化石燃料会释放大量二氧化碳。

sentence: Scientists are studying how to use ______ ______ efficiently.
sentence_translation: 科学家们正在研究如何高效利用波浪能。

sentence: ______ ______ is often used for cooking and heating.
sentence_translation: 天然气常被用于烹饪和供暖。

sentence: Some countries rely heavily on ______ ______ for electricity.
sentence_translation: 一些国家严重依赖核能发电。

sentence: ______ is an important resource for the transportation industry.
sentence_translation: 石油是交通运输业的重要资源。

sentence: Reducing ______ ______ is key to fighting climate change.
sentence_translation: 减少碳排放是应对气候变化的关键。

sentence: New technology has greatly improved work ______ in the factory.
sentence_translation: 新技术极大地提高了工厂的工作效率。

sentence: Proper disposal of ______ ______ is a major environmental challenge.
sentence_translation: 核废料的妥善处理是一项重大环境挑战。

sentence: The ______ ______ caused great damage to the surrounding area.
sentence_translation: 这场核事故对周边地区造成了巨大破坏。

sentence: Nuclear power plants are ______ ______ ______ but efficient to operate.
sentence_translation: 核电站建造昂贵但运行高效。

sentence: Solar-powered homes are ______ ______ ______ than those using fossil fuels.
sentence_translation: 太阳能家庭比使用化石燃料的家庭运行成本低。

sentence: We had grilled ______ for dinner last night.
sentence_translation: 我们昨晚晚餐吃了烤虾。

sentence: The fishermen caught a lot of ______ in the bay.
sentence_translation: 渔民们在海湾捕到了很多蛤蜊。

sentence: We saw a beautiful ______ ______ while swimming in the ocean.
sentence_translation: 我们在海里游泳时看到了一只漂亮的水母。

sentence: ______ are often served with garlic and white wine in restaurants.
sentence_translation: 餐厅里的贻贝通常搭配大蒜和白葡萄酒食用。

sentence: We should replace our ______ every three months.
sentence_translation: 我们应该每三个月更换一次牙刷。

sentence: She used two ______ to serve the soup into bowls.
sentence_translation: 她用两个勺子把汤盛到碗里。

sentence: Children enjoy catching small ______ on the beach during summer.
sentence_translation: 夏天，孩子们喜欢在海滩上捉小螃蟹。

sentence: Please put the ______ in the bin to keep the park clean.
sentence_translation: 请把垃圾放进垃圾桶，保持公园干净。
